Remote App.name: iControl 2
Remote App.description: An alternate version of the original iControl skin
Remote App.author: Simon Bailey

Remote App.author: rmundell

Remote App.name: VDJ8 Pads (iPad)
Remote App.description: Sampler trigger for your iRemote and Virtual DJ 8.
Remote App.author: Dan (djtouchdan)

Remote App.name: Remote DeckControl
Remote App.description: Turn your iPad to side-deck controller. 8 Pads matrix with Hotcues, Loops, Loop Rolls, Effects, Sampler, custom buttons and Slicer controls. 1024x768
Remote App.author: djdad

Remote App.name: Remote 8 Default Skin
Remote App.description: the default Phone and Tablet skins for VirtualDJ Remote 8.
Remote App.author: Atomix Productions

Remote App.name: Remote DualDeck Control
Remote App.description: Turn your iPad or tablet to a tactile dual-deck controller.
Remote App.author: djdad

Remote App.name: Remote Screen
Remote App.description: Add low cost screens to yours controlers / Ajouter des écrans low cost à vos contrôleurs
Remote App.author: kaleo

Remote App.name: Kazoo EQ Skin
Remote App.description: I've made this skin to use in my iPad so I can quickly change the EQ and Gains on my decks without having to turn my head to the computer. Has a Scratch wave view and the name of the songs playing as well the BPM's. A simple Skin for a good use. Hope you l
Remote App.author: the_0liveira

Remote App.name: Stems Controller
Remote App.description: Control stems via the remote app
Remote App.author: Dan (djtouchdan)

Audio Fx.name: Slipbrake8
Audio Fx.description: Slipped break with 6 beat length presets, SL1210 emulation, a wait feature, and free hand brake control.
Audio Fx.author: locodog

Audio Fx.name: keyLoopUp
Audio Fx.description: The effect waits for a loop to be called externally and raises the key once a loop. The key is reset if the fx or the loop is turned off.
Audio Fx.author: locodog

Audio Fx.name: keyLoopDown
Audio Fx.description: The effect waits for a loop to be called externally and lowers the key once a loop. The key is reset if the fx or the loop is turned off.
Audio Fx.author: locodog

Audio Fx.name: Pioneer DJM-S9 FXBanks
Audio Fx.description: Manage (load / save) the 2 FX Banks of the Pioneer DJM-S9.
Audio Fx.author: Atomix Productions

Audio Fx.name: Reverb
Audio Fx.description: Post-fader audio effect to add a sound of reverberation to the original audio signal. Wet/Dry Parameter to set the amount of the reverberation, Size Parameter to set the room size etc
Audio Fx.author: Atomix Productions

Audio Fx.name: Delay
Audio Fx.description: Audio effect which gets the audio signal and then plays it back after a period of time, creating a sound of a repeating delay. Wet/Dry Parameter to blend  the original and the delayed audio signals, and a  Length Parameter to set the amount of the delay  (
Audio Fx.author: Atomix Productions

Video Fx.name: ShowLogo
Video Fx.description: Video Effect to display your logo image on Video output with position, size, transparency and Alpha settings. Credits to SBDJ
Video Fx.author: Atomix Productions

Video Fx.name: Strobe
Video Fx.description: Video Effect to apply a repeating blackout creating a beat-aware strobe effect. Offers parameters to adjust the length of the repeat and the amount of the blackout duration.
Video Fx.author: Atomix Productions

Video Fx.name: Shake
Video Fx.description: Video Effect to apply a shake/vibration effect to the Video output. Parameters to adjust the amount/strength and the low-to-high audio frequency % that the effect will apply to.
Video Fx.author: Atomix Productions

Video Fx.name: Spectral
Video Fx.description: Video Effect to apply a 16-band equalizer type spectrum to the Video Output. Parameters to adjust the padding of the spectrum bar and their minimum height.
Video Fx.author: Atomix Productions

Video Fx.name: Negative
Video Fx.description: Video Effect to display the video in negative/opposite colors than the original ones.
Video Fx.author: Atomix Productions

Video Fx.name: Colorize
Video Fx.description: Video Effect to colorize the Video output. Offers parameters to define the duration (in beats) of the auto- coloring cycle or select a single color (when duration is set to Off) , its brightness and saturation.
Video Fx.author: Atomix Productions

Video Fx.name: Boom Auto
Video Fx.description: Video Effect to apply an auto gradual zoom-in-out to the Video Output, creating a Boom effect. Offers parameters to adjust the speed (in beats) and the depth % of the auto zoom.
Video Fx.author: Atomix Productions

Video Fx.name: Boom
Video Fx.description: Video Effect to apply a temporary and gradual zoom-in-out to the Video Output, creating a Boom effect.
Video Fx.author: Atomix Productions

Visualizations.name: Title
Visualizations.description: Video Effect to display the Artist, Title and optionally Remix of the playing track as an overlay to the Video Output. Offers settings to define its font, size, on-screen position, duration, display delay and display type (headline or banner)
Visualizations.author: Atomix Productions

Visualizations.name: Text
Visualizations.description: Video Effect to overlay - optionally scrolling - text to Video Output.  Offers settings to define its font, size, on-screen position and color
Visualizations.author: Atomix Productions

Visualizations.name: Screen Grab
Visualizations.description: Video Effect to copy a part from an application running on your main screen, and show it to the Video Output, using your mouse to grab/define the area on your main screen, and its parameters to position it to the Video Output
Visualizations.author: Atomix Productions

Visualizations.name: Slideshow
Visualizations.description: Select a folder with images and/or videos to be displayed on Video output as a slide in a sequential or random order. Parameters to define the display the duration of each image and the fade time between each.
Visualizations.author: Atomix Productions

Visualizations.name: Shader
Visualizations.description: Video Effect to display graphics visualizations on screen with the ability to download additional shaders from shadertoy.com. Offers parameters to auto-move on beat, auto-select next available and adjust their transparency.
Visualizations.author: Atomix Productions

Visualizations.name: Lottery
Visualizations.description: Video Effect to start a scrolling vertical slide of images and stop automatically at an image, creating a lottery machine simulation. Offers parameters to select a folder with images, adjust the speed of the slide, and define the time to stop the slide.
Visualizations.author: Atomix Productions

Visualizations.name: Camera
Visualizations.description: Video Effect to display the video source from a USB/builtin Camera to the Video Output. Offers parameters to select one of the available cameras, resize and position its window on screen, zoom in/out and adjust opacity.
Visualizations.author: Atomix Productions

Visualizations.name: Cover
Visualizations.description: Video Effect to display the Artwork (Cover) of the playing track to the Video Output. Offers parameters to adjust its size, on-screen position and fade in/out time.
Visualizations.author: Atomix Productions

Visualizations.name: SyphonClient
Visualizations.description: Syphon Client allows you to route video from an external application (that has Syphon support) into VDJ.
Visualizations.author: Atomix Productions

Main.name: BeatGridSL
Main.description: BeatGrid Effect slots on your pads!
Main.author: PhantomDeejay

Main.name: HotCuesNLoops
Main.description: Hot Cues and Saved Loops combined in a single pad page!
Main.author: PhantomDeejay

Main.name: KeyModPlay
Main.description: Play the same hotcue on various Keys! (Key Modulation)
Main.author: PhantomDeejay

Main.name: PhantomFX
Main.description: FX slots on your pads!
Main.author: PhantomDeejay

Main.name: Grid Adjust
Main.description: Adjust the beat grid easily from your controller.
Main.author: locodog

Main.name: Automix Live
Main.description: Access to most of the automix options from your pads, use you mouse as little as possible.
Main.author: locodog

Main.name: Cues n Loops
Main.description: Combines Hotcues and Loops into one Pads page
Main.author: djdad

Main.name: Browser Sort
Main.description: browser  sorts out from your pads
Main.author: djsadim

Main.name: Dub Loop
Main.description: Use the echo FX configured to your pads, to capture live loops and redub them.
Main.author: locodog

Main.name: Rate'n'Colour
Main.description: * rate & colour the browsed or  loaded track from your pads, browse one other folder for a loaded track
Main.author: locodog

Main.name: EchoPad
Main.description: Apply an echo fx with different parameter in 8 pads
Main.author: djniots

Main.name: cues and loops
Main.description: show on pad 1-4 Hotcues and on pad 2-8 saved loops. Both are switchable to 5,6,7,8. Native SkinpadSupport in OrangeJuice >3.4
Main.author: djnice :o)

Main.name: FX Bank
Main.description: Control FX Banks from your Pads. Requires FXBanks Effect
Main.author: djdad

Main.name: CloneLoop
Main.description: Full Clone [level, eq, filter] to a deck above or below, loop the clone and apply various effects to it., Better suited for windows users
Main.author: locodog

Main.name: Transport
Main.description: Transport control, pitch and some shortcuts for mixers with pads
Main.author: locodog

Main.name: Sampler FX
Main.description: Apply Effects on Sampler
Main.author: djdad

Main.name: Mic FX
Main.description: Select and apply Effects to the Microphone Input using the Pads.
Main.author: djdad

Main.name: Scratch Pad
Main.description: A pad designed for controillers with touchwheel.  Various buttons eliminate the need to manually cut with the crossfader.
Main.author: ZeroZuluBrav0

Main.name: DJC Buttons
Main.description: The DJC Buttons (special buttons on Hercules RMX and 4MX) can now be on the Pads section of a VirtualDJ skin
Main.author: Atomix Productions

Main.name: 16 Hotcues
Main.description: 16 Hotcues in the same Pad page
Main.author: djdad

Main.name: 16 Samples
Main.description: 16 Samples per Deck side.
Main.author: djdad

Main.name: Cue Scratch
Main.description: Apply Scratch DNA from the selected Hotcue
Main.author: djdad

Main.name: Pad FX
Main.description: A simple Pads page to trigger Effects from the Pads. Effects are triggered as toggle when pressed quickly and momentary as long as they are pressed
Main.author: djdad

Main.name: VideoFX
Main.description: Automation for the video effects boom, blur, color, negative, spectral, shake, strobe, contour, vibration and video text. It also allows you to combine shader with milkdrop, cover or slideshow.
Main.author: MrJacky

Main.name: ColorFX
Main.description: ColorFX
Main.author: djsadim

Main.name: revLoop
Main.description: Call reversed loops and slip on exit
Main.author: locodog

Main.name: Slid3R
Main.description: Tool to automate fx sliders between 2 values sync'd to BPM
Main.author: locodog

Main.name: ZvideoControl
Main.description: Automate aspects of control of deck master video fx, video transition, video crossfader, shaders on decks.
Main.author: locodog

Main.name: 32 Samples
Main.description: 32 Samples per Deck
Main.author: djdad

Main.name: plugin Bank
Main.description: load and save effect banks (pluginBanks)
Main.author: djsadim

Main.name: SvideoControl
Main.description: Automate aspects of deck video fx.
Main.author: locodog

Main.name: FX Fade
Main.description: Popular fade-out tricks for quick transitions and mixes, inspired by Pioneer DDJ-SB3
Main.author: Rune (DJ-In-Norway)

Main.name: Hotcues DVS
Main.description: Hotcue pads tailored for DVS (timecode vinyl) use. Holding vinyl and pressing the hotcues will not play from cue.
Main.author: Rune (DJ-In-Norway)

Main.name: Video Logo (Pads)
Main.description: Adjust size & position of video logo and select file to use easily.
Main.author: Rune (DJ-In-Norway)

Main.name: Mix FX (Pads)
Main.description: Apply automatic audio effects on the crossfader movement
Main.author: Rune (DJ-In-Norway)

Main.name: Key Shift
Main.description: Control songs musical key from pads
Main.author: Alex RDZ96

Main.name: Stems FX
Main.description: Apply effects to individual stems with quick access pads (Require latest version of VirtualDJ)
Main.author: Rune (DJ-In-Norway)

Main.name: Backspin FX
Main.description: Backspin effect combos for nice transitions in your mix
Main.author: Rune (DJ-In-Norway)

Main.name: Brake FX
Main.description: Turntable spin down brake effects for cool transitions in the mix
Main.author: Rune (DJ-In-Norway)

Main.name: Vocal FX
Main.description: Apply effects to the vocals only of the songs. Echo out, crush, loop, etc   (Require latest version of VirtualDJ)
Main.author: Rune (DJ-In-Norway)

Main.name: Stems Remix
Main.description: Quick & easy isolate or mute stems, based on the EzRemix approach. Vocal, Melody & Beats.. With bleed & stemsFX settings
Main.author: Rune (DJ-In-Norway)

Main.name: Automix Cues
Main.description: Easily set cue mix points for where auto mix should start and end ... For Cut, Fade, Remove Silence
Main.author: Rune (DJ-In-Norway)

Others.name: TellyMedia Controls
Others.description: Get all the Telly Media Plugin Controls on to your Pads

Others.name: BlackSheep Pads (for custom skin only)

Others.name: BSP Mic Talkover
Others.description: Quick Access to Mic Talkover settings within BlackSheep Pro

Others.name: BroadCaster GFX
Others.description: Control pads for Broadcaster GFX videoskins
Others.author: Rune (DJ-In-Norway)

Others.name: Set Shapes (for custom skin only)

Others.author: Nicotux

Others.name: BFX-Buttons
Others.description: Only works for the BFX effects (alternative addon). Control the 8 buttons & select the slot numbers

Others.name: CFX-Buttons
Others.description: Only works for the CFX effects (alternative addon). Control the 8 buttons & select the slot numbers

Others.name: xFX-Buttons
Others.description: Only works for the BFX-, CFX- & DFX- effects  (alternative addons). Control the 8 buttons of these effects

Others.name: VintageView (for videoskin)
Others.description: Only works with 'VintageView' video skin. Controls for layout

Others.name: DropSearch
Others.description: Search by field using drag & drop or click at pad
Others.author: Nicotux

Database Filters.name: My Library
Database Filters.description: (2021 Update with Hashtags etc) The essential tool for your VirtualDJ database, with smart folders to quickly locate tracks in your collection.

Database Filters.name: Mi Fonoteca
